[vc_row el_id="launch"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text="Launch your State of the Art, Social Learning Platform" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" el_class="launch-title"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]Social Learner is a big driver for engagement thanks to powerful social features and integrated Gamification.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]Social Learner integrates with LearnDash, one of the most popular WordPress LMS solutions on the market.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]We did not want to re-invent the wheel, but we wanted to provide this powerful LMS with great social learning features.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id="counters"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1435048310465{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text]

35

Courses

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text]

245

Students

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text]

3

Teachers

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text]

20

Courses Completed

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id="instructors"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="instructors-title"][vc_custom_heading text="Featured Instructors" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" el_class="launch-title"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text]

Jon Greene

The ability to interact with others makes learning more fun for your members.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text]

Newton Linchen
